mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.role_type AS roleType, a.data_scope AS dataScope, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.useable AS useable, a.is_sys AS sysData
mapper.select: SELECT , rm.menu_id AS "menuList.id", FROM T_SYS_ROLE a LEFT JOIN T_SYS_ROLE_MENU rm ON rm.role_id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SYS_ROLE( id, name, role_type, data_scope, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, is_sys, useable ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{roleType}, #{dataScope}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sysData}, #{useable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_SYS_ROLE SET name = #{name}, enname = #{enname}, role_type = #{roleType}, data_scope = #{dataScope}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, is_sys = #{sysData}, useable = #{useable} WHERE id = #{id}
